modName: Mirage - RaceMenu Preset plus UUNP BodySlide - DELETED
summary: Mirage is a RaceMenu preset that comes with a UUNP BodySlide.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/xGJQVuo.jpg[/img][/center]A lot of the inspiration was drawn from the [url=https://wow.gamepedia.com/Goblin_(playable)]World of Warcraft female goblins[/url]﻿, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85644/]Of Goblins and Men[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13953660]shidoni1[/url], and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/29658810]wnisewond[/url]'s [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88004]Dwarf preset[/url]﻿. Like many, I have love for Valenwood and wanted to create a character based on a forest goblin. A piece of her background: "Mirage is the breath of Kyne, born near Strid River, who was to be watched over until the day came, where the World Eater would ride the tides of space and time once again." Moving forward, I'm hoping I can get permission from the creators of the mod's assets that were used to make her into a follower. The reason for making her was I was sick of all the normalcy I was crafting in-game and wanted to do something different, well as creating a new body type to suit her preset.





[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/t0juIUp.jpg[/img]
I'm currently using UNP assets.

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]﻿
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* Requires skin texture plus additional stuff like brows, etc.[/i][/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]SG Female Textures Renewal + SG Textures Options[/url]﻿
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* (A.) Main File (B.) 2k/4k Body No Scar (C.) Smooth Body[/i][/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos Renewal[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/]Freckle Mania v1[/url]﻿
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* Version two may work.[/i][/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641/]Ravens Warpaint[/url]﻿[/center]
[center][color=#ea9999]Set race to Breton before loading the RaceMenu preset.[/color][/center]




[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/pzxkirP.jpg[/img]
Wisdom & Tutorials by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/29658810]wnisewond[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393]hellosanta
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756]LogRaam[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027]lthot[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/981329]tetrodoxin[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3240173]t56yr[/url]

[url=http://www.moddb.com/mods/abandoned-temple]Abandoned Temple[/url]
[url=https://general-andreis.tumblr.com/post/167155733681/gomaperopero-goma-pero-land-v2-add-new-place]Goma Pero Land V2[/url]
[color=#b6d7a8][i]* And many more.[/i][/color][/center]




[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/1fQxr7g.jpg[/img][/center]The only permission currently, that anyone has, is they're allowed to use the Mirage RaceMenu preset and/or the Plump BodySlide for their personal appearance. If you want to use the Plump BodySlide for one of your followers, you can do that as well. Crediting me would be appreciated. No one can make Mirage into a follower, without notifying me for consent, well as getting the permission to use the assets from the creators above (I'm currently looking into this). Selling the Mirage RaceMenu preset and Plump BodySlide is prohibited, when they'll always be Forever Free. Any imagery (i.e. banners) with text on it are for this page only. Feel free to use the Mirage screenshots for whatever.
author: UnstableMagic
